# isStandard

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the format is in a deinterleaved native-endian float state.

## Declaration

```swift
var isStandard: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This value returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the format is [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioCommonFormat/pcmFormatFloat32]; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Determining the Audio Format

- **isInterleaved**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the samples mix into one stream.
- **commonFormat**: The common format identifier instance.
- **settings**: A dictionary that represents the format as a dictionary using audio setting keys.
- **magicCookie**: An object that contains metadata that encoders and decoders require.
